item.title: Deconstructing RESURGE: A Deep Dive into Ivanti Malware Persistence Through Boot Sequence Manipulation
item.description: A deep dive into the RESURGE malware’s persistence mechanisms targeting Ivanti Connect Secure (ICS) appliances. This article details how RESURGE hijacks the firmware upgrade process, using SED scripts to modify critical components like /etc/ld.so.preload, CGI backdoors, integrity scanners, and even the coreboot.img for extreme persistence.
